title: Molly's First BBC
description: “Trust me, we'll get to that too.” Tom laughed, lying back on the bed next to her. His plaid shirt falling open to display the phoenix tattooed across his dark muscular abs. After stumbling across her in a rather compromising position Tom offers to give Molly some pointers. But when this innocent young woman takes the man of the house up on his taboo offer will he be able to pull out in time? Or will this dark and mysterious older man risk pregnancy and finish inside?Over 3,500 taboo words for adult audiences only. Look inside for more too hot for Amazon details!
author: F.C. Ledger
